CustomField.description: Salaries from job postings are received as a String and can sometimes be ranges with non numeric characters (e.g. $100 - $150k). The original string received from the posting will be stored in Salary_From_Job_Board__c. Code will then take that value and convert it into a single salary that can be stored in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The salary from the job posting. If the job posting listed a range, this will be the midpoint in the range.
CustomField.label: Salary
